title: How drought affects carbon balance in the Amazon
content:
Editor's note, Mar. 22, 2022: This video is no longer available. We are maintaining the link to the press release. From the NOAA/CIRES Press Release:
As climates change, the lush tropical ecosystems of the Amazon Basin may release more of the greenhouse gas carbon dioxide into the atmosphere than they absorb, according to a new study published Feb. 6 in Nature.
Full release...
